languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy, the Assassin gains +<u>((Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}) − (target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g})) / 2</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}. This lethality bonus cannot be less than 0.
languages.original_text: Атакуя противника, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g} получает +<u>(({g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} ассасина − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} цели) / 2)</u> к {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальности{/g}. Этот бонус не может быть меньше 0.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Assassin attacks an enemy, the Assassin gains +<u>((Assassin's dodge reduction)-(target's dodge))/2</u> lethality. This lethality bonus cannot be less than 0.
Whenever the Assassin attacks an enemy, the Assassin gains +<u>((Assassin's dodge reduction)-(target's dodge))/2</u> lethality. This lethality bonus cannot be less than 0.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy, the Assassin gains +<u>((Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}) − (target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g})) / 2</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}. This lethality bonus cannot be less than 0.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy, the Assassin gains +<u>((Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}) − (target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g})) / 2</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}. This lethality bonus cannot be less than 0.

languages.text: Атакуя противника, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g} получает +<u>(({g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} ассасина − {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} цели) / 2)</u> к {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальности{/g}. Этот бонус не может быть меньше 0.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy, the Assassin gains +<u>((Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}) − (target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g})) / 2</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}. This lethality bonus cannot be less than 0.

traits.locale_text: Атакуя противника, ассасин получает +<u>((снижение уклонения ассасина − уклонение цели) / 2)</u> к летальности. Этот бонус не может быть меньше 0.
Атакуя противника, ассасин получает +<u>((снижение уклонения ассасина − уклонение цели) / 2)</u> к летальности. Этот бонус не может быть меньше 0.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}攻击敌人时，都会获得+<u>（（刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}）-（目标的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}））/2</u>{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}。此效果带来的致命加值不会为负值。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy, the Assassin gains +<u>((Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}) − (target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g})) / 2</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}. This lethality bonus cannot be less than 0.

traits.locale_text: 每当刺客攻击敌人时，都会获得+<u>（（刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}）-（目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}））/2</u>致命。此效果带来的致命{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}不会为负值。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} ataque a un enemigo, gana +<u>(({g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} del asesino) − ({g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} del objetivo)) / 2</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}letalidad{/g}. Esta bonificación a la letalidad no puede ser inferior a 0.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy, the Assassin gains +<u>((Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}) − (target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g})) / 2</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}. This lethality bonus cannot be less than 0.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el asesino ataque a un enemigo, gana +<u>(({g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} del asesino) − ({g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} del objetivo)) / 2</u> de letalidad. Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} a la letalidad no puede ser inferior a 0.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} einen Gegner angreift, erhält der Assassine +<u>((Assassinen-{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichreduzierung{/g}) – (Ziel-{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g})) / 2</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethalität{/g}. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf Letalität kann nicht kleiner als 0 sein.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy, the Assassin gains +<u>((Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}) − (target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g})) / 2</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}. This lethality bonus cannot be less than 0.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Assassine einen Gegner angreift, erhält der Assassine +<u>((Assassinen-{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichreduzierung{/g}) − (Ziel-{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g})) / 2</u> Lethalität. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf Lethalität kann nicht kleiner als 0 sein.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassin{/g} attaque un ennemi, il gagne +<u>(({g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} de l'assassin) − ({g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de la cible)) / 2</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}létalité{/g}. Ce bonus de létalité ne peut pas être inférieur à 0.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy, the Assassin gains +<u>((Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}) − (target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g})) / 2</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}. This lethality bonus cannot be less than 0.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'Assassin attaque un ennemi, il gagne +<u>(({g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} de l'Assassin) - ({g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} de la cible)) / 2</u> points de létalité. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de létalité ne peut être inférieur à 0.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}が敵を攻撃した時、 +<u>((アサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}) − (ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g})) / 2</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}を得る。この致死率{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は0未満にはならない。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy, the Assassin gains +<u>((Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}) − (target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g})) / 2</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}. This lethality {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cannot be less than 0.

traits.locale_text: アサシンが敵を攻撃した時、 +<u>((アサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}) − (ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g})) / 2</u>の致死率を得る。この致死率{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は0未満にはならない。
